data.title: Our daily bread
data.meta_description: A spectacular visual essay composed of epic tableaus, a haunting vision of our modern food industry, and the methods and technology utilized for mass production.
data.text:
APA Citation, 7th Edition (style guide)

Geyrhalter, N., Widerhofer, W., Glaser, M., & Kitzberger, M. (2006). Our daily bread (Widescreen edition.). Icarus Films Home Video.

Chicago / Turabian - Author Date Citation, 17th Edition (style guide)

Nikolaus Geyrhalter et al.. 2006. Our Daily Bread. Icarus Films Home Video.

Chicago / Turabian - Humanities (Notes and Bibliography) Citation, 17th Edition (style guide)

Nikolaus Geyrhalter et al.. Our Daily Bread Icarus Films Home Video, 2006.

MLA Citation, 9th Edition (style guide)

Geyrhalter, Nikolaus, Wolfgang Widerhofer, Markus Glaser, and Michael Kitzberger. Our Daily Bread Widescreen edition., Icarus Films Home Video, 2006.
